rawls.converter¶

Functions

rawls_to_pil(rawls_img) Read and convert rawls image file into PIL image
rawls_to_png(rawls_img, outfile) Convert rawls image into PNG image
rawls.converter.rawls_to_pil(rawls_img)[source]¶

Read and convert rawls image file into PIL image

Parameters:rawls_img – {Rawls} .rawls image file loaded
Returns:PIL RGB image

Example:

>>> import numpy as np
>>> from rawls.converter import rawls_to_pil
>>> from rawls.classes.rawls import Rawls
>>> path = 'images/example.rawls'
>>> rawls_img = Rawls.load(path)
>>> rawls_pil_img = rawls_to_pil(rawls_img)
>>> np.array(rawls_pil_img).shape
(100, 100, 3)
rawls.converter.rawls_to_png(rawls_img, outfile)[source]¶

Convert rawls image into PNG image

Parameters:
  • rawls_img – {Rawls} rawls image object
  • outfile – {str} output path of the .png image to save
